milestones.title: Python Fundamentals & Asynchronous Programming
milestones.description: Establish a strong foundation in Python's core concepts, including syntax, data structures, object-oriented programming, and an introduction to asynchronous programming with asyncio.

tasks.name: Python Syntax and Data Structures
tasks.description: Learn variables, data types (lists, dictionaries, sets, tuples), operators, and basic input/output operations.

tasks.name: Control Flow and Functions
tasks.description: Master conditional statements (if/else), loops (for/while), and defining/using functions, including function arguments.

tasks.name: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
tasks.description: Understand classes, objects, inheritance, encapsulation, polymorphism, and basic class design patterns.

tasks.name: Error Handling and Modules
tasks.description: Learn to use try-except blocks for robust error handling and how to create/import and manage Python modules and packages.
tasks.resources: Python Official Docs: Errors and Exceptions

tasks.name: Asynchronous Programming with Asyncio
tasks.description: Introduction to concurrency in Python using async/await keywords and the asyncio library for non-blocking I/O operations.

milestones.title: Web Frameworks: Flask & Django Basics
milestones.description: Get hands-on experience with two leading Python web frameworks, understanding their core principles for building web applications and handling HTTP requests.

tasks.name: Introduction to Flask
tasks.description: Set up a basic Flask application, define routes, handle requests, and return responses.

tasks.name: Flask Templating with Jinja2
tasks.description: Learn to create dynamic HTML pages using Jinja2 templates, including template inheritance and variables, within Flask applications.

tasks.name: Introduction to Django
tasks.description: Understand Django project and app structure, create basic views, map URLs, and grasp the MVT (Model-View-Template) pattern.

tasks.name: Django Models and Admin Interface
tasks.description: Learn to define database models, establish relationships, run migrations, and utilize the Django admin panel for data management.

milestones.title: Database Integration & ORMs
milestones.description: Learn to design database schemas, interact with SQL databases, and utilize Object-Relational Mappers (ORMs) for efficient and programmatic data management.

tasks.name: SQL Fundamentals
tasks.description: Learn basic SQL commands: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, and various types of JOINs for relational database querying.

tasks.name: Database Design Principles
tasks.description: Understand concepts like normalization (1NF, 2NF, 3NF), primary keys, foreign keys, and designing efficient database schemas.

tasks.name: Integrating Databases with Flask (SQLAlchemy)
tasks.description: Learn to use SQLAlchemy (Core and ORM) with Flask for robust and flexible database interactions, including migrations with Alembic.

tasks.name: Django ORM Deep Dive
tasks.description: Master Django's built-in ORM for complex queries, filtering, aggregation, and managing model relationships.
tasks.resources: Django Official Documentation: ORM QuerySet API

tasks.name: Database Migrations
tasks.description: Understand how to manage database schema changes over time using framework-specific tools like Django Migrations or Alembic.

milestones.title: RESTful APIs & API Design
milestones.description: Develop skills in designing, building, and securing RESTful APIs using Python frameworks, focusing on standardized communication.

tasks.name: RESTful Principles
tasks.description: Understand the core concepts of REST architecture, HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), statelessness, and resource identification.
tasks.resources: REST API Tutorial: What is REST?

tasks.name: Building APIs with Flask-RESTful/Connexion
tasks.description: Implement RESTful endpoints, request parsing, and response serialization using Flask extensions like Flask-RESTful or Connexion.

tasks.name: Django REST Framework (DRF)
tasks.description: Learn to build powerful and flexible web APIs quickly with Django REST Framework, including serializers, viewsets, and routers.

tasks.name: API Authentication and Authorization
tasks.description: Implement various API authentication schemes (e.g., token-based, JWT) and authorization/permission systems.

tasks.name: API Documentation (Swagger/OpenAPI)
tasks.description: Learn to generate and maintain interactive API documentation using tools like Swagger/OpenAPI for better developer experience.

milestones.title: System Architecture & Advanced Topics
milestones.description: Explore common architectural patterns, enhance application performance, and ensure security and testability of backend systems.

tasks.name: Caching Strategies
tasks.description: Implement caching mechanisms (e.g., Redis, Memcached) to improve API response times and reduce database load.

tasks.name: Message Queues (Celery/RabbitMQ)
tasks.description: Understand and implement asynchronous task processing, background jobs, and inter-service communication using message queues like Celery with RabbitMQ.

tasks.name: Introduction to Microservices
tasks.description: Grasp the concepts of microservices architecture, its benefits and drawbacks, and how it differs from monolithic applications.

tasks.name: Testing Backend Applications
tasks.description: Write comprehensive unit, integration, and functional tests for Flask and Django applications using frameworks like Pytest.

tasks.name: Security Best Practices
tasks.description: Learn about common web vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, CSRF, SQL Injection) and implement best practices for preventing them in Python applications.

milestones.title: Cloud Deployment & DevOps Basics
milestones.description: Learn how to containerize applications, deploy them to various cloud platforms, and understand continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines for efficient release management.

tasks.name: Docker Fundamentals
tasks.description: Learn to containerize Python applications, create Dockerfiles, and manage containers and images.

tasks.name: Cloud Platforms Overview
tasks.description: Introduction to major cloud providers like AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Azure, and platform-as-a-service (PaaS) like Heroku.

tasks.name: Deploying Flask/Django to Cloud
tasks.description: Deploy a containerized Python backend application to a chosen cloud platform (e.g., AWS EC2/ECS, GCP App Engine, Heroku, DigitalOcean Droplets).

tasks.name: CI/CD Concepts
tasks.description: Understand Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment principles, workflow, and tools (e.g., GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD).

tasks.name: Basic Monitoring and Logging
tasks.description: Implement basic application monitoring (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana) and centralized logging (e.g., ELK stack, CloudWatch) for production systems.
